General.Name: Sichuan Tianwei Electronic Co Ltd
General.Description: Sichuan Tianwei Electronic Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of high-speed automatic fire suppression and explosion suppression systems, high-energy aviation ignition discharge devices, and high-precision fuse devices in China. Its products are used in weapons, aviation, aerospace, shipbuilding, electronics, and other fields, as well as coal, energy, power, dust, and transportation industries. Sichuan Tianwei Electronic Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Chengdu, China.

1.Name: Mr. Jian  Chen
1.Title: Chief Engineer, Deputy GM, Core Technician & Director
